website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Response Trail Boost runs and works as intended. While it may have a rather unique design, the upper delivers the kind of support, flexibility, and structure that trail runners usually look for in their neutral trail shoes. The Response Boost has decent arch support, cushioning, and unbelievable grip on almost all kinds of surfaces, including the road despite the heavily-lugged outsole.
pros: The superb comfort of the Response Trail Boost begins right out of the box, according to a large number of comments
Some runners believe the durability is better than average trail shoes
A good number of reviews consider the shoe as an excellent investment
The traction provided by the Continental rubber compound is a proven commodity in the business
The multi-directional lugs make uphill and downhill running a little easier
It is quite nimble and quick on technical trail, as noted by a couple of testers
Many users raved about its ability to tackle the trail and road
Several reviews appreciated the wide toe box
Adidas uses a very breathable mesh in the Response Boost
cons: The shoe could use some weight reduction, observed some runners
Others noted that the design looks strange because of the seatbelt-like overlays

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and sharp looking!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect all around shoe! They're not too bulky and they look super nice, ladies! I wear them as soon as they arrived. I went on a 6 mile walk and felt like my shoes had been broken in, they are super comfortable!! Highly recommend these shoes! I didn't give five stars only because they run a bit large. I was going to exchange them, but they didn't have a size 9 in stock so I decided to keep them. Plus, it's always better to have a hiking shoe a bit larger then too small when he comes to hiking shoes from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe. It's super comfortable and so stylish . I get compliments on this everywhere I wear it . People often think I put on two different shoes , but I love telling them I bought them that way. I ran a 5K in them right out the box( usually a no-no in the world of running), but I had no issues. It cushions your feet protects your ankles really well. I would've given a 5 but I originally bought a 8.5, I returned for a 8 . The shoe does run a little large so be careful with the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: L. SPRINGER

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes for me, a prek teacher - not pretty but  functional...
customer_reviews.text: I luv these shoes! Wore them all summer( for long walking adventures) and started school 09/06 wearing them. Wore socks when hot, humid or raining. Normal summer day - no socks, no problem! The sole is the secret weapon against fatigue! It cushions each step regardless of the surface, wet or dry.. I luv the comfort, support and looks of this shoe. I purchased a second pair of Adidas that I also wear. However, I will need to order a new pair of these shoes to have when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ivr

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes!!! I have never worn Adidas. I am more of New Balance girl but my massage therapist recommended that I get a shoe with more arch support and this one rocks. Now, from the pic, the pink looks more red...it is pink, for sure. However, it is still a great looking shoe and I could not be happier with my purchase. In fact, I have to say that this is the most comfortable athletic shoe that I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: fits large
customer_reviews.text: I have used Addidas glide boost road shoes for years, I wanted the trail version and ordered the same size. They are way too big especially in width, the laces have to be nearly all the way cinched and I have a very high arch. I have no idea if I would like them if they were the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG!
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors but the size is too big. Fits more like an 11. I'm bummed because I needed them for vacation and now cannot send back.
customer_reviews.author: BOA~Vic

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite shoes ever! Comfy insole, nice wide base, and plenty of sole grooving to provide awesome traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Picard

customer_reviews.title: I like the look but the shoe is too wide for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look but the shoe is too wide for my thin foot. Second time I try ordering and they are still too wide around the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously comfortable and look great. Fit a little wide in the toe box, but not so much that it's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: aamazon3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are cool looking and comfortable. Hiked in them for 3 days and never got a blister.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good looking, you put them on like a sock, which provides additional arch support. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trail running shoes. Large toe box and grip on the sole is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love these! Doesn't seem to have good arch support
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these! Doesn't seem to have good arch support, and I have regular to slightly SLIGHTLY narrow feet - just not a good fit. Had to order a full size or size and a half down (in Brooks and Mizuno I'm a 8.5, for these I ordered a 7.5!!!) Otherwise, a REALLY cool looking shoe and I wanted a trail runner I could wear for some "everyday" travel days. Great product! Just ... not for my type of foot (I have a regular width toe-box, and this toe box was wayyyyy too wide). Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Reinert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a bit large but it's okay since I plan to hike in them. Lots of support!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse stefanowicz

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 pairs of these shoes, I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: VonnegutVixen

customer_reviews.title: Two different color shoes
customer_reviews.text: Although these sneakers fit great and looked somewhat like the picture, when they arrived to my house, they sent two different color shoes. One pink and one yellow. I wanted the yellow ones as I have the high top versions in white and I love them. I called the helpline to get them to send me the right shoes and they told me they didn't have anymore. VERY DISAPPOINTED. They gave me back my money but in the end it was a sucky experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mason-Coyner

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable from the first time you wear them
customer_reviews.text: Great,comfortable from the first time you wear them.No break-in time.Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten 1/2 size down but still a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: But overall they are very comfortable and I am pleased
customer_reviews.text: The picture is off. I think that must be the men's version. The red is way more hot pink than I expected. But overall they are very comfortable and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SarahH

customer_reviews.title: Not for narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a pretty narrow foot. I wanted to try these out because the seemed similar to the Raven Boost which fit a narrow foot quite well. Sadly they are way to big for my foot. I don't have to untie the shoe to get my foot out at all. However, if you feet are regular or wide these shoes are quite comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great Trail Running shoe but beware of the yellow color - comes in two different sole colors
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the color because it came with one shoe yellow and one shoe pink. I couldn't rally around the color difference but I reordered them in the gray and have been happy with them. They are very comfortable and have the type of support you need on the trail.
customer_reviews.author: Tiz

customer_reviews.title: Different colored soles?!?!  Huh??
customer_reviews.text: If you select the "Clear Grey/Dark Grey/Solar Yellow" color, the SOLES ARE DIFFERENT COLORS!... ON PURPOSE! I, like some other reviewers, like the shoe a lot (the fit's a little big and a little wide), but can't do the two different colored soles. I don't know why Adidas would do this.
customer_reviews.author: onlockdown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are nice hiking shoes, good sole But they are kind of bulky
customer_reviews.author: rebecca ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have foot problems , so comfort and softness in footwear is an essential issue. these shoes to be wide , are ideal for me , I can walk with them and not even feel them . fully recommended
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: 1 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Ordered womens 7.5 which is my regular size. I was sooo excited to try it on, when i did felt like 8.5 really disappointed with the sizing. The shoe itself is good looking. Returned them, the size that would have worked for me is in a different price.
customer_reviews.author: philip manganti

product_meta.title: Adidas Performance Response Tr Boost W Running Shoes,collegiate Navy/black/sun Glow Yellow,5 M Us
product_meta.description: Put the trailhead behind you as you blaze a path in the adidas Outdoor Response Trail Boost trail-running shoe!.
feature_bullets: Global Store items have separate terms, are sold from abroad, and may differ from the UK version, including fit, age ratings, and labelling.
